description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军国防大学校长、政治委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), who served as President and Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的直辖市，郑和（1958年生）的出生地。
description.en: A direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Zheng He (born 1958).

en: General of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军衔。
description.en: The highest rank in the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会
en: 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academic institution in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 俄罗斯联邦军队综合军事学院

zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦军队综合军事学院
en: Combined Arms Academy of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation

description.zh-cn: 俄罗斯联邦武装力量的一所高等军事教育机构。
description.en: A higher military educational institution of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国东部设立的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army in eastern China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十一集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十一集团军
en: 31st Group Army of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军的一个集团军，2017年改革后番号改为第七十三集团军。
description.en: A group army of the PLA Ground Force, which was redesignated as the 73rd Group Army after the 2017 reforms.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会训练管理部

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会训练管理部
中国人民解放军总参谋部军训部
en: Training and Administration Department of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的职能部门之一。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军曾在中国西南部设立的大军区。
description.en: A former military region of the People's Liberation Army in southwestern China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中央军事委员会训练管理部部长。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the Minister of the Training and Administration Department of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事科学研究机构。
description.en: The highest military science research institution of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中国人民解放军国防大学政治委员。
description.en: A lieutenant general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中国人民解放军国防大学政治委员。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, currently serving as the Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军国防大学校长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as President of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中国人民解放军国防大学校长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, currently serving as President of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中央军事委员会训练管理部部长。
description.en: A general of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the Minister of the Training and Administration Department of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 上海市

description.zh-cn: 郑和出生于上海市。
description.en: Zheng He was born in Shanghai.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军上将

description.zh-cn: 2019年7月晋升上将军衔。
description.en: Promoted to the rank of general in July 2019.

relationships.target: 中国共产党第十九届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 郑和是中国共产党第十九届中央委员会委员。
description.en: Zheng He was a member of the 19th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 2017年6月至2021年8月，郑和担任中国人民解放军国防大学校长。
description.en: From June 2017 to August 2021, Zheng He served as the President of the PLA National Defence University.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 2021年8月至2024年6月，郑和担任中国人民解放军国防大学政治委员。
description.en: From August 2021 to June 2024, Zheng He served as the Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

relationships.target: 俄罗斯联邦军队综合军事学院

description.zh-cn: 郑和毕业于俄罗斯联邦军队综合军事学院战役战术专业，获军事学硕士学位。
description.en: Zheng He graduated from the Combined Arms Academy of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, majoring in operational-tactical studies, and obtained a Master's degree in Military Science.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第三十一集团军

description.zh-cn: 2008年6月，任陆军第三十一集团军参谋长。
description.en: In June 2008, he was appointed Chief of Staff of the 31st Group Army.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 2011年2月，任南京军区副参谋长。
description.en: In February 2011, he was appointed Deputy Chief of Staff of the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会训练管理部

position.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部军训部部长
position.en: Minister of the Military Training Department of the PLA General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 2013年2月至2016年，担任中国人民解放军总参谋部军训部部长。
description.en: From February 2013 to 2016, he served as the Minister of the Military Training Department of the PLA General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 2015年7月，任成都军区副司令员。
description.en: In July 2015, he was appointed Deputy Commander of the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会训练管理部

description.zh-cn: 2016年2月至2017年1月，任中央军事委员会训练管理部部长。
description.en: From February 2016 to January 2017, he served as the Minister of the Training and Administration Department of the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军军事科学院

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月至2017年6月，任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: From January 2017 to June 2017, he served as the President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

relationships.target: 陈照海

description.zh-cn: 2013年2月，郑和接替陈照海担任中国人民解放军总参谋部军训部部长。
description.en: In February 2013, Zheng He succeeded Chen Zhaohai as the Minister of the Military Training Department of the PLA General Staff Department.

relationships.target: 蔡英挺

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月，郑和接替蔡英挺升任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: In January 2017, Zheng He succeeded Cai Yingting and was promoted to President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

relationships.target: 吴杰明

description.zh-cn: 2021年8月，郑和接替吴杰明出任中国人民解放军国防大学政治委员。
description.en: In August 2021, Zheng He succeeded Wu Jieming as the Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 2024年6月，钟绍军接替郑和出任中国人民解放军国防大学政治委员。
description.en: In June 2024, Zhong Shaojun succeeded Zheng He as the Political Commissar of the PLA National Defence University.

relationships.target: 张仕波

description.zh-cn: 2017年6月，郑和接替张仕波出任中国人民解放军国防大学校长。
description.en: In June 2017, Zheng He succeeded Zhang Shibo as the President of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 2021年8月，许学强接替郑和出任中国人民解放军国防大学校长。
description.en: In August 2021, Xu Xueqiang succeeded Zheng He as the President of the PLA National Defence University.

description.zh-cn: 2017年6月，杨学军接替郑和出任中国人民解放军军事科学院院长。
description.en: In June 2017, Yang Xuejun succeeded Zheng He as the President of the PLA Academy of Military Science.

description.zh-cn: 2017年1月，黎火辉接替郑和出任中央军事委员会训练管理部部长。
description.en: In January 2017, Li Huohui succeeded Zheng He as the Minister of the Training and Administration Department of the Central Military Commission.
